title: Iraqi Prime Minister Faces Growing Pressure To Step Down
teaser: Steve Inskeep talks to Ali Khedery, who used to support Nouri al-Maliki. Khedery, head of the Dubai-based Dragoman Partners, thinks al-Maliki should step down because of the extremist crisis in Iraq.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
